title: Home
cleaned_text: Paul Marik, M.D., co-founder and chief scientific officer of the FLCCC, will testify today to the Health Provider Services Committee of the Ohio State House in support of HB 73, a bill that, if passed into law, will protect doctors and healthcare professionals from unwarranted policies that prevent patient access to repurposed medications.
